Regulation Name(s): Creatine phosphokinase/creatine kinase or isoenzymes test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ADVIA Chemistry Creatine Kinase (CK_L) Assay and Enzyme 3 Calibrator for quantitative determination and calibration of creatine kinase activity in serum and plasma using ADVIA Chemistry systems
Indications for Use Summary: ADVIA Chemistry Creatine Kinase (CK_L) assay is for in vitro diagnostic use in the quantitative determination of creatine kinase activity in human plasma (lithium heparin) or serum to aid in diagnosis and treatment of myocardial infarction and muscle diseases; Enzyme 3 Calibrator is for calibration of the CK_L assay on ADVIA Chemistry systems
